body_html: I don't know if they e.g. run WLM with cuDNN disabled (it becomes a single large op otherwise). Some C++ microbenchmarks would be useful too, and we don't have those except some old code in the benchmark repo.
body_text: I don't know if they e.g. run WLM with cuDNN disabled (it becomes a single large op otherwise). Some C++ microbenchmarks would be useful too, and we don't have those except some old code in the benchmark repo.
body: I don't know if they e.g. run WLM with cuDNN disabled (it becomes a single large op otherwise). Some C++ microbenchmarks would be useful too, and we don't have those except some old code in the `benchmark` repo.
